name: Chakour
description: A refreshing and aromatic blend of green tea and fresh mint leaves, with hints of sweetness and a cooling effect. This tea is a staple in Moroccan culture, enjoyed daily across the country.

name: TanTan by Hamza
description: A zesty blend with hints of lemon and orange zest, combined with green tea and a touch of mint. Ideal for a refreshing afternoon tea, commonly served with honey for added sweetness.

name: El Rahal Yellow
description: An earthy and calming blend with notes of chamomile, lemongrass, and a hint of green tea. Inspired by the quiet evenings in the Moroccan Sahara.

name: Lion red
description: A warm and rich tea blend with cloves, cinnamon, and cardamom. Often served during winter months, this tea brings comfort and warmth.

name: 9371 Black
description: A delicate floral blend with rose petals, orange blossom, and green tea, capturing the essence of Morocco’s Atlas mountains. Often enjoyed as a fragrant evening tea.
